question: Rajkumar Barjatya, who recently passed away, was associated with which of the following field?
explanation: Rajkumar Barjatya, who recently passed away, was associated with Film Producing. He was born in Mumbai, Some of his notable films are Hum Aapke Hain Koun, Maine Pyar Kiya, Prem Ratan Dhan Paayo.
